en.chanceGreenlineRailroad: Take a ride on the GREEN LINE RAILROAD and roll again
en.chanceBluelineRailroad: Take a ride on the BLUE LINE RAILROAD and roll again
en.chanceRedlineRailroad: Take a ride on the RED LINE RAILROAD and roll again
en.chanceGoToWaterShow: GO to the WATER SHOW and pay 2 dollars
en.chanceGoToFireworks: GO to the FIREWORKS and pay 2 dollars
en.chanceGoToLoopTheLoop: GO to the LOOP THE LOOP
en.chanceGoToTheRestrooms: Pay 3 dollars to take the tramway to the restrooms
en.chanceGoToGo: GO to GO. Collect 2 dollars allowance as you pass
